hero.title: About Coach Wil
hero.subtitle: Building strong foundations, clear teaching, and real progress

journey.title: üéµ My Dance Journey
journey.p1: Coach Wil is a passionate bachata dancer with over 15 years of experience in Latin dance. Like many dancers, he started by learning steps and partner work.
journey.p2: But over time, he noticed something important: Many dancers get stuck, not because they don't try hard enough, but because they never fully build their foundations.
journey.p3: During the COVID period, Wil made a conscious decision to slow down and rebuild his own dancing from the ground up. He focused deeply on footwork, body movement, timing, arm coordination, and musicality. Elements that truly make partner dancing feel natural and effortless.
journey.p4: That shift changed everything for Wil...

rdf.title: üíª RDF Bachata Fusion App
rdf.subtitle: Train smarter. Move better. Dance with confidence.
rdf.intro: The RDF Bachata Fusion App is designed to help you build strong bachata foundations through structured solo training, so you feel more confident and in control when dancing with a partner.

challenge.title: üîπ Bachata Step Challenge ‚Äì Part 1 & Part 2
challenge.part1: Part 1 is for beginners to improvers.
challenge.part2: Part 2 is for intermediate to advanced dancers.

laboratorium.title: üîπ The RDF Laboratorium
laboratorium.description: A dedicated space for ongoing practice, including:
points: Tutorials inspired by Bachata Lab group classes
laboratorium.conclusion: The Laboratorium helps you practice consistently, revisit key concepts, and connect solo training with real partner work.

whyExists.title: üéØ Why this app exists
whyExists.reason1: Most dancers learn only through partner work.
whyExists.reason2: Real progress happens when you also train your solo foundation.
whyExists.reason3: This app gives you the tools to practice anytime, at your own pace ‚Äî so classes feel easier, dancing feels smoother, and confidence grows naturally.

cta.title: üëâ Want the full details?
cta.description: Explore the complete experience inside the app and discover all the content available.
cta.linkText: Learn more ‚Üí Check it out in the app

teaching.title: üè´ Teaching in St. Gallen
teaching.p1: For the past 4 years, Coach Wil has been teaching and coaching bachata in St. Gallen, working with dancers of all levels from complete beginners to experienced dancers who feel stuck.
teaching.p2: His classes are known for being:
p2List: Focused on real improvement, not just memorizing moves
teaching.p3: Wil believes people come to dance for many reasons: to feel confident, to socialize, to move freely, to reconnect with themselves and all of that matters.
teaching.p4: That's why Bachata Lab is not just about classes, but about building a community where dancers grow together.

mission.title: Coach Wil Mission:
mission.content: Help dancers build strong foundations, move with confidence, and feel free and connected on the dance floor.
mission.extra: Whether you are just starting or refining your technique, Coach Wil's goal is simple: guide you step by step, without pressure, and with purpose.

personalNote.title: Wil Personal Note:
personalNote.content: Since I started teaching, I've seen something beautiful happen again and again: strangers becoming friends, dancers smiling more, and students gaining confidence ‚Äî not only in their dancing, but also in themselves and in their everyday life.
personalNote.reason: This is one of the main reasons I do what I do.
personalNote.gratitude: I'm deeply grateful to have the opportunity to teach and coach so many amazing people here in St. Gallen, and to be part of their journey on and off the dance floor.
personalNote.invitation: So I invite you to, practice with intention, have fun, and dance with passion.
personalNote.closing: I'm excited to welcome you into the Bachata Lab family.

goodToKnow.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Good to know
items: All classes are flexible base on your level; you choose when to attend
Classes are taught in English (and partially in German)
Memberships are limited to 30 people in total
Registration is between the 28th end of the month to 2nd start of the month
Non-members can still join classes via EventFrog or at the door (at a higher price)
All members get extra classes for 25 CHF instead of 40 CHF
All members get private classes for 65 CHF/hour instead of 90 CHF/hour (Applies to Classic, Party Bangers, and VIP members)

privateCoaching.closing: ‚ú® Whether you want clarity, confidence, or a full breakthrough private coaching gives you the fastest path forward.

questions.question: Do I need a partner to join the classes?
questions.answer: No partner is required! We rotate partners during class so you get to dance with different people. This also helps you learn faster and makes the class more social.

questions.question: I've never danced before ‚Äî can I still join?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Our Thursday beginner class is designed for complete newcomers. We focus on fundamentals, rhythm, and connection so you can build confidence step by step.

questions.question: How long until I can dance socially?
questions.answer: That depends on you and how often you practice. For instance, many students feel comfortable dancing socially after one month of consistent training ‚Äî especially with the extra support from the RDF Bachata Fusion App.

questions.question: What should I wear to class?
questions.answer: Comfortable clothes and indoor shoes (or socks with grip). Bring water to stay hydrated. No special outfit is required ‚Äî just come ready to move and have fun!

questions.question: How do I practice outside of class?
questions.answer: You'll have access to practice sessions, plus the RDF Bachata Fusion App, where you can review class material, work on drills, and follow challenges to progress from home.

questions.question: Why is membership better than paying per class?
questions.answer: Memberships give you more for less. Instead of paying class by class, you get flexible access to weekly classes, app support, and party passes ‚Äî making it easier to practice consistently, save money, and truly grow as a dancer.

questions.question: Is bachata good for fitness and social life?
questions.answer: Yes! Bachata helps with body coordination, musicality, and confidence ‚Äî while also being a fun way to meet new people and connect in a friendly community.

outro.title: Still have questions?
outro.description:
Feel free to reach out to Coach Wil directly.
We're here to help you start your bachata journey!
